verses.verse: And when <S%H5315>any<s%> will <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H4503>food<s%> <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, his <S%H7133>offering<s%> shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>; and he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon <S%H5414>it<s%>, and put frankincense on <S%H3828>it<s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>: and he shall <S%H7061>take<s%> <S%H8033>out<s%> his <S%H7062>handful<s%> of the <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H8081>there<s%>, and of the oil <S%H3828>there<s%>, with all the frankincense there and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, to be an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

And the <S%H3498>remnant<s%> of the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>': it is a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>.

And if you <S%H7126>bring<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H3989>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven<s%>, it shall be <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, or <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And if your <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> baked in a <S%H4227>pan<s%>, it shall be of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
You shall <S%H6626>part<s%> it in <S%H6595>pieces<s%>, and <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> on it it is a food <S%H4503>offering<s%>.
And if your <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> baked in the <S%H4802>fryingpan<s%>, it shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> that is <S%H6213>made<s%> of these things unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and when it is <S%H7126>presented<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, he shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> it unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7311>take<s%> from the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> a <S%H234>memorial<s%> <S%H6999>there<s%>, and shall burn it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And that which is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>': it is a thing <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>.

No food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, which you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, shall be <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H2557>yeast<s%>: for you shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> no <S%H7603>yeast<s%>, nor any <S%H1706>honey<s%>, in any <S%H801>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>.

As for the <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%>, you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> them unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but they shall not be <S%H5927>burnt<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%>.

And every <S%H7133>oblation<s%> of your food <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall you <S%H4414>season<s%> with <S%H4417>salt<s%>; neither shall you allow the <S%H4417>salt<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> to be <S%H7673>lacking<s%> from your food <S%H4503>offering<s%>: with all your <S%H7133>offerings<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4417>salt<s%>.

And if you <S%H7126>offer<s%> a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> of your <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> for the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> of your <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> green <S%H24>ears<s%> of corn <S%H7033>dried<s%> by the <S%H784>fire<s%>, even corn <S%H1643>beaten<s%> out of full <S%H3759>ears<s%>.
And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon <S%H7760>it<s%>, and lay <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> on it it is a food <S%H4503>offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> of <S%H1643>it<s%>, part of the beaten corn <S%H8081>there<s%>, and part of the oil <S%H3828>there<s%>, with all the frankincense there it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
